actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to provide authority for women' business centers to enter into contracts with Federal departments and agencies to provide specific assistance to women and other under-served small business concerns.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to allow a women's business center to contract with a Federal department or agency to provide specific assistance to women and other underserved small businesses.

titles.title: A bill to provide authority for women' business centers to enter into contracts with Federal departments and agencies to provide specific assistance to women and other under-served small business concerns.
